per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*sin(time*1.13);
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*sin(time*1.23);
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.33);
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=wave_x = wave_x + 0.2*sin(0.32*time);
per_frame_6=wave_y = wave_y + 0.2*cos(0.32*time);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=ob_r = wave_r;
per_frame_9=ob_g = wave_g;
per_frame_10=ob_b = wave_b;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=zoom = zoom + 0.02*(sin(9*ang) + sin(sin(time*12*sin(time)*rad))*0.5 - cos(rad)*0.5);
per_pixel_5=rot = rot + 0.08*abs(0.746-rad)*sin(2.2*(0.5-rad)+5.7*sin(0.1*time));
per_pixel_6=sx = sx + 0.1*(0.59*1-rad)*sin(0.733*time)*below(sin(time),0);
per_pixel_7=sy = sy + 0.1*(0.59*1-rad)*cos(0.953*time)*above(sin(time),0);
per_pixel_8=zoom = zoom - 0.015*(0.5*abs(3)-rad)*below(rad,1.5);
per_pixel_9=cx = cx + 1.3*(0.5-rad)*cos(0.977*time);
per_pixel_10=cy = cy + 1.3*(0.5-rad)*cos(0.643*time);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float error     = 0.5;        // maximum random pixel offset
warp_6=`float diffusion = 0.006;      // dither strength
warp_7=`float fadeout   = -0.0006;    // may be minor 1/256 due to the error diffusion dither;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw*1.5 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_10=`float magic = lum(GetPixel(lerp(uv_orig,uv, 4))) - lum(GetBlur2(lerp(uv_orig,uv,-12)));
warp_11=`uv = lerp(uv_orig,uv, magic*12 ) + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*texsize.zw*error;
warp_12=`ret = GetPixel(uv)+(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*diffusion + fadeout;
warp_13=`ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.wzy;
warp_14=`//ret-=roam_sin.yzw*roam_cos;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float srad = sqrt(rad)+ 0.05;
comp_4=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_5=`//ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.wzy;
comp_6=`ret-=roam_sin.yzw*roam_cos;
comp_7=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, uv + 0.06*float2(cos(uv.y*27*0.5),sin(uv.x*39*0.5))).xyz);
comp_8=`}
